ValidationRule.description: Restricts Opportunity ownership changes to Sales Management, and Admin roles unless exempt from validation rules or have custom permissions. Open opportunities may be changed by the current owner or if the current owner is Sales Routing)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) && ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Benefits_BYOB' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Benefits_BoR' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Benefits_New_Plan' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Acquisition' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Tier_Upsell_Opportunity' ) && AND( ( NOT($User.Exempt_from_Validation_Rules__c) && $Setup.Opportunity_Custom_Permissions__c.Change_Ownership__c <> TRUE && NOT (CONTAINS($Label.Sales_Management_Roles , $UserRole.Name + ',')) && $UserRole.Name <> 'admin' && $UserRole.Name<> 'Integration Users' && PRIORVALUE(OwnerId) != '0058Y000009wXHM' && Account.Skip_Validation_For_Routing__c = FALSE ), (IsClosed || PRIORVALUE(OwnerId) != $User.Id) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have proper permissions to change the Owner field. Please contact your PE for assistance.
